activities: Plus Relocation Services, Inc. provides services to employers for candidate recruiting, employee relocation, and employee assignment management; including program development, policy administration, employee counseling, vendor management services, expense processing, and arranging for the acquisition, maintenance and resale of real estate of such relocated employees.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Czech Republic, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
